verses.verse: Now these are the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH7626>: From the north <WH6828> end <WH7097>, beside <WH3027> the way <WH1870> of Hethlon <WH2855> to the entrance <WH935> of Hamath <WH2574>, Hazar-enan <WH2704> at the border <WH1366> of Damascus <WH1834>, northward <WH6828> beside <WH3027> Hamath <WH2574>, (and they shall have their sides <WH6285> east <WH6921> and west <WH3220>,) Dan <WH1835>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Dan <WH1835>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Asher <WH836>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Asher <WH836>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> even unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Naphtali <WH5321>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Naphtali <WH5321>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Manasseh <WH4519>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Manasseh <WH4519>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Ephraim <WH669>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Ephraim <WH669>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> even unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Reuben <WH7205>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Reuben <WH7205>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Judah <WH3063>, one portion <WH259>.

And by the border <WH1366> of Judah <WH3063>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, shall be the oblation <WH8641> which ye shall offer <WH7311>, five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> reeds in breadth <WH7341>, and in length <WH753> as one <WH259> of the portions <WH2506>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>: and the sanctuary <WH4720> shall be in the midst of it <WH8432>.

The oblation <WH8641> that ye shall offer <WH7311> unto Jehovah <WH3068> shall be five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> reeds in length <WH753>, and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>.

And for these <WH3548>, even for the priests, shall be the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641>: toward the north <WH6828> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> in length <WH3220>, and toward the west ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>, and toward the east <WH6921> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>, and toward the south <WH5045> five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> in length <WH753>: and the sanctuary <WH4720> of Jehovah <WH3068> shall be in the midst thereof <WH8432>.

It shall be for the priests <WH3548> that are sanctified <WH6942> of the sons <WH1121> of Zadok <WH6659>, that have kept <WH8104> my charge <WH4931>, that went not astray <WH8582> when the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> went astray <WH8582>, as the Levites <WH3881> went astray <WH8582>.
And it shall be unto them an oblation <WH8642> from the oblation <WH8641> of the land <WH776>, a thing most <WH6944> holy <WH6944>, by the border <WH1366> of the Levites <WH3881>.

And answerable <WH5980> unto the border <WH1366> of the priests <WH3548>, the Levites <WH3881> shall have five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> in length <WH753>, and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> in breadth <WH7341>: all the length <WH753> shall be five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>, and the breadth <WH7341> ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505>.
And they shall sell <WH4376> none of it <WH4171>, nor exchange it <WH7225>, nor shall the first-fruits of the land <WH776> be alienated <WH5674>; for it is holy <WH6944> unto Jehovah <WH3068>.

And the five <WH2568> thousand <WH505> that are left <WH3498> in the breadth <WH7341>, in front <WH6440> of the five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>, shall be for common <WH2455> use <WH5892>, for the city, for dwelling <WH4186> and for suburbs <WH4054>; and the city <WH5892> shall be in the midst thereof <WH8432>.

And these shall be the measures <WH4060> thereof <WH6828>: the north side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>, and the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>, and on the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>, and the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967>.

And the city <WH5892> shall have suburbs <WH4054>: toward the north <WH6828> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>, and toward the south <WH5045> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>, and toward the east <WH6921> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>, and toward the west <WH3220> two hundred <WH3967> and fifty <WH2572>.

And the residue <WH3498> in the length <WH753>, answerable <WH5980> unto the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641>, shall be ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> eastward <WH6921>, and ten <WH6235> thousand <WH505> westward <WH3220>; and it shall be answerable <WH5980> unto the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641>; and the increase <WH8393> thereof shall be for food <WH3899> unto them that labor <WH3498> in the city <WH5892>.
And they that labor <WH5647> in the city <WH5892>, out of all the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>, shall till it <WH5647>.

All the oblation <WH8641> shall be five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> by five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505>: ye shall offer <WH7311> the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641> four-square <WH7243>, with the possession <WH272> of the city <WH5892>.

And the residue <WH3498> shall be for the prince <WH5387>, on the one side and on the other of the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641> and of the possession <WH272> of the city <WH5892>; in front <WH6440> of the five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> of the oblation <WH8641> toward the east <WH6921> border <WH1366>, and westward <WH3220> in front <WH6440> of the five <WH2568> and twenty <WH6242> thousand <WH505> toward the west <WH3220> border <WH1366>, answerable <WH5980> unto the portions <WH2506>, it shall be for the prince <WH5387>: and the holy <WH6944> oblation <WH8641> and the sanctuary <WH4720> of the house <WH1004> shall be in the midst thereof <WH8432>.

Moreover from the possession <WH272> of the Levites <WH3881>, and from the possession <WH272> of the city <WH5892>, being in the midst <WH8432> of that which is the prince <WH5387>'s, between the border <WH1366> of Judah <WH3063> and the border <WH1366> of Benjamin <WH1144>, it shall be for the prince <WH5387>.
And as for the rest <WH3499> of the tribes <WH7626>: from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Benjamin <WH1144>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Benjamin <WH1144>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Simeon <WH8095>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Simeon <WH8095>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Issachar <WH3485>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Issachar <WH3485>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Zebulun <WH2074>, one portion <WH259>.
And by the border <WH1366> of Zebulun <WH2074>, from the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> unto the west <WH3220> side <WH6285>, Gad <WH1410>, one portion <WH259>.

And by the border <WH1366> of Gad <WH1410>, at the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> southward <WH8486>, the border <WH1366> shall be even from Tamar <WH8559> unto the waters <WH4325> of Meribath <WH4808> - kadesh <WH6946>, to the brook <WH5158> of Egypt <WH1419>, unto the great sea <WH3220>.

This is the land <WH776> which ye shall divide <WH5307> by lot unto the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478> for inheritance <WH5159>, and these are their several portions <WH4256>, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> Jehovah <WH3069>.
And these are the egresses <WH8444> of the city <WH5892>: On the north <WH6828> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds by measure <WH4060>;

and the gates <WH8179> of the city <WH5892> shall be after the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH7626> of Israel <WH3478>, three <WH7969> gates <WH8179> northward <WH6828>: the gate <WH8179> of Reuben <WH7205>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Judah <WH3063>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Levi <WH3878>, one <WH259>.

And at the east <WH6921> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds <WH7969>, and three gates <WH8179>: even the gate <WH8179> of Joseph <WH3130>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Benjamin <WH1144>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Dan <WH1835>, one <WH259>.

And at the south <WH5045> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds by measure <WH4060>, and three <WH7969> gates <WH8179>: the gate <WH8179> of Simeon <WH8095>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Issachar <WH3485>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Zebulun <WH2074>, one <WH259>.

At the west <WH3220> side <WH6285> four <WH702> thousand <WH505> and five <WH2568> hundred <WH3967> reeds <WH7969>, with their three gates <WH8179>: the gate <WH8179> of Gad <WH1410>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Asher <WH836>, one <WH259>; the gate <WH8179> of Naphtali <WH5321>, one <WH259>.
It shall be eighteen <WH8083> thousand <WH505> reeds round about <WH5439>: and the name <WH8034> of the city <WH5892> from that day <WH3117> shall be <WH3074>, Jehovah is there.
